Package org.openhab.core.thing

Class UID

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.common.AbstractUID
      • org.openhab.core.thing.UID
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelGroupTypeUID, ChannelGroupUID, ChannelTypeUID, ChannelUID, ProfileTypeUID, ThingTypeUID, ThingUID
    @NonNullByDefault
public abstract class UID
extends AbstractUID
    Base class for binding related unique identifiers within the SmartHome framework.

    A UID must always start with a binding ID.

    Author:
    Dennis Nobel - Initial contribution, Oliver Libutzki - Added possibility to define UIDs with variable amount of segments, Jochen Hiller - Bugfix 455434: added default constructor, object is now mutable

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.openhab.core.common.AbstractUID

    • Constructor Detail

      • UID

        public UID()
        For reflection only. Constructor must be public, otherwise it cannot be called by subclasses from another package.

      • UID

        public UID​(java.lang.String uid)
        Parses a UID for a given string. The UID must be in the format 'bindingId:segment:segment:...'.
        Parameters:
        uid - uid in form a string (must not be null)

      • UID

        public UID​(java.lang.String... segments)
        Creates a UID for list of segments.
        Parameters:
        segments - segments (must not be null)

      • UID

        protected UID​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> segments)
        Creates a UID for list of segments.
        Parameters:
        segments - segments (must not be null)
